item.title: Trump directs Pentagon to 'use all available funds' to pay troops during shutdown
item.description: The president's directive would ensure US military personnel don't miss a scheduled paycheque next week.

item.title: Afghan Taliban confirm 'retaliatory' border attacks on Pakistan
item.description: The escalation comes days after Pakistan was accused of bombing a market inside Afghanistan.

item.title: South Africa debates changing name of world-famous Kruger park
item.description: Some question whether the 19th Century Afrikaner leader should still be memorialised.

item.title: No survivors found after Tennessee explosives plant blast
item.description: With 18 people unaccounted for, the tragedy is "even more devastating than we thought", says a sheriff.

item.title: Israelis praise Trump at huge rally ahead of expected hostage release by Hamas in Gaza
item.description: Hundreds of thousands gather in Tel Aviv as Palestinians continue to return to Gaza City after the Israeli withdrawal.
